[![](7.1-dispersal-fragmentation.png)](7.1-dispersal-fragmentation.nlogo){style="float:left; margin-right:10px; margin-bottom:5px;"} This is an implementation of the model of the relationship between dispersal and fragmentation described in

Ruckelshaus M, Hartway C and Kareiva PM 1997 Assessing the data requirements of spatially explicit dispersal models. _Conservation Biology_ **11** 1298-1306.
